div.p: James L. Dodds
Co. L. 23 Engrs
American Ex Force
Miss Ellen Smith
111 Hatton Street
Jackson Tennes
U.S.A
July 8 1918
Dear Ellen -
I have received three letters from you in the last week and I can't tell you how glad I was to here from you
They finely got this mess streightened out so we could get our mail and I sure was glad of it
I got eleven letters one night so you can guess I had to read them all before I could sleep
There was just one thing wrong I didnt get enough from you
I dont understand why you dont get my letters
I sure do write you wheather you are out ther or not
This mail is a funny thing I got a letter from you today you wrote May 21 and the other ones I got before this one was wrote in June.
So you can see I get my mail backwards, But I am always glad to get them no matter how they come I am still working real hard on my truck
Will this mud be some road when we get it through I am at a different place from where I wrote you last
Ellen I move most every week but I will go back to the other house pretty soon
Will I guess you are having some hot weather back home now. You should be over here where it isnt so hot
The days are pretty warm but the nights are cool To day has been the hotest day we have had in some time and I didnt suffer a bit
To night is cool I sleep under three blankets every night so you can see how hot is is
What did they do with our Uncle Robert about running in to the Md switch hope they didnt fire him.
I got a letter from him to day but that was written before he had the wreck. Acy Vernon is writing to Lena Schuaa to night.
We get a lot of news from each others letters of course we dont send the letters but we tell each other the interesting news.
There is one of us together Cartmill VernonArr Mc Nally and my self
We get together and talk over old times and how much we would like to be back to Dear Old Jax on Well it is most dark and where it gets dark it is bed time
It is nine fifteen and still day light will close write me real soon and tell me all the news
with lots of love
James L Dodds
Co L 23 Engrs
American Exp Force
Mail N YFrance
